Solver Documentation¶

Module for solving the Schrödinger equation across different scenarios.

solver.command_line_interface()¶

CLI function for executing the solver.

solver.create_potential_from_data(x_values, interpolation_method, interpolation_points)¶

Generates a potential based on given interpolation data.

solver.load_scenarios_from_file(filename)¶

Loads input data from a file and returns a list of scenarios.

solver.solve_schroedinger_equation(scenario_data)¶

_summary_

Args:

scenario_data (_type_): _description_

Schroedinger Equation
